actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 12). Until the grapple ends, the target is restrained and the beetle cannot bite another target. A grappled target takes 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage at the start of each of the beetle’s turns.
